parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (int64) Unique ID for a user in the Databricks workspace.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Query by which the results have to be filtered. Supported operators are equals(

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to return in response.

parameters.name: excludedAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude in response.

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: Specifies the index of the first result. First item is number 1.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Desired number of results per page.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Attribute to sort the results. Multi-part paths are supported. For example,

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The order to sort the results.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

get.description: Gets information for a specific user in Databricks workspace.
